programme.desc: Abc Song: Well, what do you know? The Wolves have decided to learn the alphabet. Masha is ready to help them by singing an easy to remember "ABC Song". (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Family Comes First: Pitted against the Tinhorns on Rancheroo Day, Jon learns that his family is more important to him than winning. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Clover's Tiny Problem: When Min dotes on a newly hatched dino, Clover feels jealous, but then learns that no dinosaur can replace him in Min's heart. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Tango's BFF: After helping a fellow triceratops, Tango becomes attached to her new friend and doesn't want her to rejoin her herd, but learns that it's selfish to keep her from her family. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: The Case of the Mysterious Mystery: DB accidentally eats all the sparkleberries Nori was planning to use in his next dessert. He tries covering it up while Detective Kitty investigates. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Frido Unleashed: After the Beavers get Construction Kitty to do their to-do list of repairs for them so they can go to the beach, Frido steps up and helps Kitty learn how to say "no". (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Winner Bakes All: Construction Kitty builds Nori a robotic helper to concoct the perfect smoothie. When the electronic chef rebels, Nori and Kitty must defeat it in a Smoothie Showdown. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Mayhem at the Museum: Explorer Kitty covers for PI at the museum to allow him to enjoy his new hobby: weightlifting. But she unintentionally awakens an ancient Penguinese statue! (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Baby Born
programme.desc: Fun in the Bath / Let's Bake Some Cupcakes!: Emma had a fantastic day playing outside with her sister, Carla. But now it's bath time...(S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Baby Born
programme.desc: Let's Go Camping! / Birthday Party!: Together, Emma and Teddy embark on an imaginative camping trip with delicious marshmallows and fun campfire songs. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Home Improvement: The Bear's idea to hang a new picture frame on the wall ends with a huge explosion. The Bear has to start repairs. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Pasta La Vista: Who is the best cook in all the forest? Masha or Dasha? As usual, Bear will have to solve the girls' dispute. (S5 Ep14)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Love Is In The Bear: Ah, love! Bear prepares a gift for the Lady Bear and dreams of winning her heart. But Masha is also here! Will her interference in the affairs of the heart lead to? (S5 Ep15)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Wish Upon A Star: Wow, it's another New Year! Masha has a lot of experience in organising unforgettable celebrations, so she takes matters into her own hands. (S5 Ep16)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Firefighter of the Day: Wow, that's really something! Masha saves Bear from a fire! And a grateful Bear makes her a gift - a toy fire truck. (S5 Ep17)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Awesome Blossoms: Bear's garden has been overtaken by dandelions! As Bear fighting against the weeds, Masha doesn't get why he is throwing them away. After all, dandelions can be beautiful! (S5 Ep18)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: How To Train Your Plant: She-Bear is going on holiday and leaves Bear with her "pet" - a flycatcher. Masha, of course, knows better than anyone how to treat the flycatcher. (S5 Ep21)

programme.title: Care Bears: The Quest for the Rainbow Stone

programme.title: Agent Binky: Pets of the Universe

programme.title: Gus - The Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: The Miniwhats

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Land of The Heebie- Jeebies: Raoul is afraid to ride the ghost train, so Ollie draws him a doppelganger, a "brave Raoul," to set an example for him. Raoul follows in his footsteps. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Her Majesty The Spider: In the Middle-Ages, Molang and Piu Piu watch the king run after a small spider. He trips, falls into a magic caldron and turns into... a spider! (S5 Ep36)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Potters Bar to Cardington: Michael Portillo's travels resume in leafy Hertfordshire, where he attempts a canoe slalom course, and visits the estate of author Barbara Cartland. [S]

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
